slot-data-type.title: Data type
slot-data-type.description: The data type ID of the data stored in this slot

slot-type.title: Slot type
slot-type.description: Determines if the slot is an input or an output

inherited-slot.title: Inherited slot
inherited-slot.description: Only valid for output slot. Defines from which slot to inherit the data type. Can be '*' to select the first available slot.

custom-name.title: Custom name
custom-name.description: User-customizable name. Only displayed in UI.

inheritance-conversions.title: Inheritance conversions
inheritance-conversions.description: Only valid for slot inheritance. Applies conversiuons to the inherited type. Must contain map from input data type ID to output data type ID. Conversion is a finite text replacement system.
